name: Olivia Lind Haldorsson/Bottes Vertes
goal:
To promote children's rights on behalf of children's rights actors.

To develop and support implementation of strategy, policy and organisations in the area of human rights/children's rights.
interests: Communication, Consumer Affairs, Development, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives: Children's Rights and Child Protection in the context of EU Justice and Home Affairs, Development Policy and External Affairs. EU Digital Agenda, including Safer Internet for Children. EP Inter-group on children's rights.
